name: reservations-to-screens
description: Root package for managing all ReservationsToScreens subprojects

scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:infoscreen-react" "npm run dev:infoscreen-svelte"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend-api && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd RoomManagementFrontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:infoscreen-react: cd infoscreenreact && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:infoscreen-svelte: cd infoscreensvelte && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm i" "cd backend-api && npm i" "cd RoomManagementFrontend && npm i" "cd infoscreenreact && npm i" "cd infoscreensvelte && npm i"
